headline: Consolidated Edison Q1 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: ED's first-quarter earnings miss estimates, and revenues grow 12.1% year over year. The company's operating income rises during the same period.

headline: Southern California Edison likely faces ‘material losses’ from Eaton Fire, CEO says
summary: The utility plans to tap California's wildfire insurance fund to pay off most of the potential damages, company leaders said.
